reviews.title: Horrible laptop buy at your own risk.
reviews.review_text: This is the slowest laptop ever. It always crashes, it is super slow, the speakers are horrible, and the video interface is so bad it is impossible to host virtual meetings because again the video is horrible and the speaker is practically nonexistent. I should have known something when I noticed it didn't have a name on it anywhere. It was cheap so I thought it would still work the same. It doesn't. I am so use to the blue screen whenever I turn it on that it is sad. It crashes all the time. I can't even give it to the kids because of all the complaints listed! I do not recommend or will purchase again.

The sound was really muffled and it's not good for a college laptop it's too big. I don't know if it's because of my wifi but it's reslly slow. And I don't really understand how to set it up correctly (using google instead of the other thingy they have on for search) and I had a computer before SOO…. Yea SONT really recommend. I'll have to buy a new one

reviews.title: Not what it says it was
reviews.review_text: This wouldn't connect to wifi nor did it recognize wifi to connect to, the screen would black out intermittently and the description says it has windows 11 but it had windows 7! And I found it odd that it was already named with someone else's name!
This thing worked for maybe two weeks. Got it for college and my in laws ended up having to buy me a better one because this one kept crapping out in the middle of doing homework.

reviews.title: Concerns
reviews.review_text: It's very very slow, like if I wanted to just download a game it lags horribly. I can't even get to settings without it lagging or even watch YouTube without crashing. I thought it would be reliable but it even lags when I try to use it for school, resulting in me being able to do nothing.

reviews.title: Very Poor! Will Be Returning!
reviews.review_text: Very unsatisfactory. Upon opening the box, the laptop felt flimsy and cheap. After a very long set-up, I realized how cheap and awkward the keyboard layout is. Trying to use and run Chrome was a joke. Websites kept crashing or timing out. The screen itself kept glitching and trying to switch desktop screens. Poor quality! Overall, a consistent slow load time and constant lagging even with only one web browser open. Would NOT recommend and will be returning!

reviews.title: What's up with the screen?
reviews.review_text: I purchased this not long ago because my other laptop crashed on me and for the past two weeks, when I go to work on a school assignment the screen will freeze out black with a red line across it like the screen is broken. I have attached a video of what it is doing. I really either want my money back or a brand new one that doesn't do this. I haven't gone on any websites that are not school related so I know there isn't a bug from me on here.

when i ordered this laptop, it was after a long search for the right one because I needed it for college online and it definitely said windows 11 because that was a priority. well when I get it , its not windows 11 , its 10,and I cant upgrade for whatever reason, then its not durable the lining around the screen at top right hand corner is somehow not popping back into place and after a while screwed my screen up in that spot and I have barely even touched or used this laptop yet and now I basically have to search again spend again and get a new one, trying to find out what my warranty is on this piece of junk because I have not even had it that long for me to not be able to use it very deceived and disappointed, thank you

reviews.title: You get what you pay for
reviews.review_text: The processor on this computer is so slow that you cannot watch any type of video on it. Even when it's hardwired to a cable network, the video just lags. Also, when trying to watch Peacock on it, the videos won't even load to be able to watch. As far as surfing, the Internet, it reminds me of an outdated desktop.

reviews.title: disappointment
reviews.review_text: This is a horrible computer. it doesn't stay connected to the internet, and you can't manually connect it back to the internet. You have to restart the entire computer to get the internet to work again. It is not my internet. I have no issues with any of my other devices. It flashes a black screen every other second for minutes at a time and does this repeatedly. I have hardly used this computer and it was a waste of money.

reviews.title: Unhappy Customer
reviews.review_text: I used the computer for one day. It was plugged in ai the battery was charged. I trued ti play a video and no xound cane out wven theough the volume on the compter was all the way up, as well as the sound on the video. I left the cimputer on and plugged in. When I came back the next day the computer would not even turn on. Very disatisfied wuth this producy

I have only had this laptop a month and it already has so many issues. It flashes the screen all the time black out of nowhere, it won't hold a charge, and only one charging port works. It was 100% a scam!!!!!

Terrible buy. The laptop screen faded to black multiple times when I first opened it. Secondly it can't open emails while my other 2006 older laptop and phone still can. Which confirmed the laptop was the issue

reviews.title: Don't buy this crap
reviews.review_text: Just a pcs of junk slow keep shut off while using. Tried to return it no refund after a month now and no one knows where it's at. Sold through a 3 rd party so Walmart won't refund me and the seller won't respond

item does not work, and walmart refused return when I tried (within their return policy window) because the item they shipped me didn't match the barcode on my receipt. Now, I am stuck paying for a laptop that I can not use.

reviews.title: Deceptive Laptop Description
reviews.review_text: Item description states it includes Windows 11 Pro. Not only the laptop does not have Win 11 installed, the laptop does not meet the system requirements to upgrade to Win 11, as the processor is not supported. See included pictures. Message states the current laptop operating system Windows 10 will no longer be supported or receive free updates after Oct 14, 2025

reviews.title: Instant Return
reviews.review_text: Shady. The laptop shipped with Windows Update turned off, and when i attempted to update, there were nothing but errors. There were applications and services named in Cyrillic that i could not remove. When I attempted to factory reset the machine, that didnt work either. Instant return.

Computer its too slow to load up and wifi i cant even get more than 1 megabyte when testing when in my fone go over 50 !! Need a replacement probably defective!! I was tryin to dsome updates in the system my it can help but i have two days tryin to download them and still not done !! Cpu works 100% all the time !! Thats why it strugles to manage stasks!!

Very cheap material. The battery charger broke off after only a months use and I only use it at home. It's a weird charger too would have to search online. And biggest lie is that the operating system is not 11. Will be incapable soon. Would like a refuns

reviews.title: sticking mouse button, SLOW right out of the box
reviews.review_text: first time using and the mouse button in key board sticks. its super slow running any program at all. im not a fast typer but it can barely keep up with that. I bought this computer to run a data program that should run on a 20 year old computer and this lap top will not run it without freezing. feels really cheap made (flimsy) but that could be because the slim model. internet connects good. wouldn't waste my money on one again.

reviews.title: IT RUNS HOT
reviews.review_text: This computer is very thin. It becomes hot to the touch when using and especially when recharging it. Even the charger head becomes hot and cannot be charged on a single instance. There are glitches or bugs when using the Word application. It has no CD slot. It looks cheap from first glance. There are not many applications pre-downloaded.

reviews.title: Crappy
reviews.review_text: Slow to setup. No matter what I'm trying to adjust when adding the programs I need, this laptop says I can't make changes and it is managed by an administrator which is not me. Went through the process of removing that but it won't remove nor will it let me make changes still. No user manual to help. Difficult to navigate through the settings. Just hate this from day 1.

reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
reviews.review_text: I have had nothing but trouble since I got this laptop. First off, it froze during setup and I ended up having to reset the computer. Long story short, it's awful! I've had to reset multiple times, it's slow, the battery doesn't last a couple hours! I am so disappointed! Thought I was getting a great deal… I got a headache.

reviews.title: Awful waste of money! Just buy the name brand!
reviews.review_text: I bought this laptop for an online class as the processor and specifications matched what I needed, however when I'm on a video call which is 50%of the class, the screen will tweak out and go black. This being the main reason I bought this laptop makes me very mad and disappointed.

reviews.title: Do not buy.
reviews.review_text: I received the Laptop and it's doesn't run like it should. I can't sign in and get a spinning wheel and the whole computer is laggy. It takes 5 minutes to just load any web page. Takes 10 minutes to start. The battery won't charge!! I wouldn't recommend at all.

reviews.title: Sent older model computer than listed
reviews.review_text: The computer itself is fine, but I was sent a windows 10 in stead of a windows 11 plus like described in the description. I had no idea until I was comparing it to another computer. Everything on the packaging also said windows 11 plus. I've called multiple times and left messages to the company but they refused to respond to the matter. I wouldn't of even cared, but windows 10 wont be supported on this computer in the next few months. Just for the fact that's they were so deceiving about all of it, makes me so frustrated for other customers of theirs that won't notice. If they fixed the mistake or at least acknowledged it happened, that would be one thing. But straight up taking advantage of people is unacceptable.

reviews.title: not exactly what I ordered
reviews.review_text: First of all, I ordered a red laptop and it came in silver. I was supposed to have 2.64 GHz and has 1.60 GHz. It only has one usb port and came with a limited instruction pamphlet which did not help much. I was not familiar with the touch pad and had to figure it out. I do not wish to return it after going through the trouble of setting everything up and I needed to use it right away as my previous laptop was dying. I am normally happy with my Walmart tech purchases but this experience was disappointing.

reviews.title: I was scammed
reviews.review_text: I was emailed by the company that produces this laptop and was told that the one I ordered was unavailable, and can they send me a different one. I was strapped for time because I was starting school and agreed. It was supposed to be a better quality computer with more Ram etc. I got it and it doesn't last very long. I use it for thirty minutes and the battery saver comes on because the laptop can't hold a charge. I feel as if I've been ripped off. I should have said no and waited for the original one that I ordered.
make sure to keep on a. rearhable surface. i had this flat on my desk and it overheated within an hour.
Problem is that laptop getting very hot. Also as new computer, we got error and not be able to set up, so returned.

reviews.title: Bad computer
reviews.review_text: It literally stopped working just a few days after it was too late for me to return it. The screen started cutting off and on. Now I am stuck with a $200 computer that I can't use

This laptop was defective from day one within 20 minutes of me, opening the laptop and taking out of the box. The screen started going black as I was working on it. By day, three of the screen would not light up at all.

reviews.title: Bought 2 not good
reviews.review_text: Had to return.. computer started crashing upon setting it up bought 2..my wife is having problems with the second one she just started setting hers up was using her old computer..now she's trying to set this one up same issue too late to return smh

reviews.title: What a mess
reviews.review_text: It would not connect to the internet even after my tech young man tried, but he was able to connect internet to my ipad. He said he didn't know what was wrong with it
After only about six weeks the screen has began to flash black and green. I can't not complete much because if the constant blinking and it also continuously disconnects from the internet.

reviews.title: inconsistent
reviews.review_text: the product feels abit flimsy and the screen randomly cuts out needing a restart along with the internet connection struggling needing to be constantly reset to keep it bound to any wifi signal. other then that it functions well enough

reviews.title: not happy
reviews.review_text: the computer is glitching. I can be doing something and all the sudden the computer screen jumps from black to off and I move the mouse and again it jumps from black to off. not happy with it but I guess you get what you pay for.

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.review_text: I can't get it to stay connected to the internet, the screen keeps blinking and I have restarted at least ten times just so I can submit one school assignment. Worthless!!!

reviews.title: Missing charger
reviews.review_text: First off it didn't arrive with the charger..the battery didnt last me very long and it was over all very glitchy. It seems like a good set up its just I couldn't use it for long since the charger didnt arrive.
Owned for six months used maybe 6 times for storing photo and for cake decorating now it won't come on and I have not found anywhere to register for warranty

Opened up laptop upon arrival. Started setting up laptop for use and the bottom of the laptop got so hot that it would burn you if you touched it. I was afraid it would be a potential fire hazard so I returned immediately the next day.
it will not upgrade oast window 11 release 22H2. says it is not compatible so it will not be updating as release 22H2 has reached end of service. don't waste your money.

reviews.title: torn laptop case
reviews.review_text: The product took a long time to arrive but was as expected and it arrived torn up and the computer was a little damaged, the product doesn't look bad at all but the product arrived in very bad condition.
it's so slow. it won't run more than 3-4 things at one time. it seems to overheat fast and the battery life is maybe 1-2 hours at most. My old laptop runs faster than this one and it's 3years old.

reviews.title: Think twice.
reviews.review_text: Price was appealing for this laptop. Had it about 30 days then will not power in. Tried to return to Walmart but 30 days had passed. Guess I'm stuck with a new paper weight.

reviews.title: Cheap and unreliable
reviews.review_text: It does not work well at all- struggles to load basic yahoo.com and screen goes blank with white lines when attempting "complex" task such as visiting a school website.

reviews.title: Does not have what is stated to have
reviews.review_text: The advertisement stated it had Windows 11 Pro on it but it only had Windows 10 Pro. Also, it would not allow me to make a system back up did or a recovery disc. Not very pleased.

reviews.title: Very reliable computer
reviews.review_text: The computer has been very unreliable and now will not open to the start page the computer has been very unreliable and now will not open to the start page

reviews.title: No good tablet
reviews.review_text: This computer won't let me download apps. It has short battery life and I had to plugged up all night and still no charge. I thought this was a good fit for me, but I don't think it is.

reviews.title: Poor Keyboard Design
reviews.review_text: The laptop's overall design is poor because the keyboard is not based on the standard design, as evident in the backspace being further right. Also, the shift key on the right side is much smaller than the standard keyboard. The caps lock key doesn't have a light on it, so there is no way for me to know that I've accidentally hit it until I notice all letters are in capitols. In addition to the keyboard design flaws, the mouse pad is rather large, which makes it awkward for me to use because I usually rest my wrist on the bottom of laptop as I type, which makes my hand heel hit the mouse pad. If you are a poor typist (one of people who use only two fingers to type) and do not bend your wrist or rest your wrist as you type, this laptop might work well for you.

reviews.title: Bought a different computer elsewhere.
reviews.review_text: The user manual was primarily in an Asian language and comparatively very little in English. I did not use this computer and did not remove it from the box it arrived in. I returned it for a refund, and bought a different computer elsewhere with more than double the storage capacity.

reviews.title: Deceptive buisness practice or honest mistake?
reviews.review_text: Agree with others who reviewed this product. User manual is a waste unless you read chinese. No setup instructions included. Two days after receiving laptop began sending me messages for updates needed and out of date. (verion of windows has reached end of service actual message). However upon trying to update from windows version 22H2 to 23H2 it will not allow me because the end of service date was Oct 8 2024. Contacted microsoft about this issue and how to update and thier response was i am unable too. According to them the processer is not big enough and out of date so untill this issue resolved i am stuck. I informed them that this was a new laptop and purchased within days of contacting them. Thier response was i had been misinformed because in fact after they tried to use their team view to investigate the problem i was told the laptop was actually 4 years old according to their checkout of the laptop. My question to you is how would you like to proceed in making good on this purchase? I purchased this laptop for my buisness and have aleady lost two weeks dealing with these issues so sending this one back for repairs is unacceptable in my opinion due to the fact it was advertised as being new. I propose that you in fact send me a verifiable new unit with an RGA number and address to send this unit back to you postage paid. I will be anticipating your response and contacting me as soon as possible

reviews.review_text: the system sucks it wont connect to the home wifi. its slow to respond

reviews.title: Fraud I never received laptop!!!

I've had the computer for about six weeks and only used it for about a total of eight hours and suddenly it won't come on. It won't charge.
It was defective as it went to black screen with red lines through it. It was very slow in loading pages and running tasks. I already returned it

no touch screen on this model that was my fault though I need to return it it hasn't been used to still in the box
